title: security outcomes
extract: GDPR Security Outcomes. Created: 18 May 2018. Updated: 18 May 2018. This guidance describes a set of technical security outcomes that are considered to represent appropriate measures under the GDPR. It has been developed jointly between the Information Commissioners Office (ICO) and the NCSC.May 18, 2018
extract_html: GDPR Security Outcomes. Created: 18 May 2018. Updated: 18 May 2018.
